body_html: I don't think I fully understand your idea here - a simple solution I can imagine would be to let the op declare whether it's stateful or not and only allow a failed-over worker which has only executed stateless op to rejoin the session. And restart the session if it's not the case.
body_text: I don't think I fully understand your idea here - a simple solution I can imagine would be to let the op declare whether it's stateful or not and only allow a failed-over worker which has only executed stateless op to rejoin the session. And restart the session if it's not the case.
body: I don't think I fully understand your idea here - a simple solution I can imagine would be to let the op declare whether it's stateful or not and only allow a failed-over worker which has only executed stateless op to rejoin the session. And restart the session if it's not the case.
